name: Myri Health
description:
Myri Health transforms maternal care with the Myri Health App, a comprehensive platform that leverages AI to deliver personalized pregnancy and postpartum support. By identifying risks and detecting preterm labor, we significantly improve birth outcomes. 

We meet growing families where they are and provide affordable resources.
